short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block all popups and Block Google Ads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Popup & Ads Blocker is a browser extension that gives you advanced control over your browsing experience. - Block all popups: Customize a list of websites where you want to completely disable unwanted popups. - Block Google ads: Remove annoying advertisements from Google's network for a cleaner and faster browsing experience. Perfect for those seeking a simple and effective solution to improve productivity and enjoy an uninterrupted web experience.
